Package Controller

Class GuestController

java.lang.Object
Controller.GuestController
public class GuestController extends Object
Guest Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the guest details. Guest Controller also connect the Guest User interface with the Guest class and any changes made to guest will go through guest controller.
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cheong Jin Hui

  • Constructor Details

    • GuestController

      public GuestController()

  • Method Details

    • displayGuestUI

      public static void displayGuestUI()
      This method of display guest UI connects the guest controller and the guest UI class. By using this method, guest UI will then display all the options that the staff can choose with regards to guest details.

    • createGuestProfile

      public static Guest createGuestProfile()
      This method of display guest UI connects the guest controller and the guest UI class. By using this method, guest UI will then display all the options that the staff can choose with regards to guest details.
      Returns:
      guest object that was create with all the values of its attribute.

    • removeGuestProfile

      public static int removeGuestProfile(String name, String icNum)
      This method removes guest from the array list guestList. It does so by searching the index of the particular guest in the array list guestList by matching the name and IC/Passport number of the guest. If no such guest is found, it will be conveyed to the staff and 0 will be returned. If the guest is found, the guest will be removed from array list guestList.
      Parameters:
      name - Guest's name.
      icNum - Guest's IC/Passport number.
      Returns:
      If guest is found, it returns 1 as removal of guest is successful, if guest is not found, it returns 0 as removal is unsuccessful.

    • removeGuestProfile

      public static void removeGuestProfile(String roomNum)
      This method removes guest from the array list guestList. It does so by searching through the entire array list guestList and for each index of guest, the room number will be compared with the parameter roomNum, if it matches the guest is then removed. This method removes all guest staying in the same room when the guest checks out.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - Guest's room number.

    • searchGuestProfile

      public static int searchGuestProfile(String name, String icNum)
      This method search guest from the array list guestList. It does so by searching the index of the particular guest in the array list guestList by matching the name and IC/Passport number of the guest. Both the guest name and IC/Passport number must be the same as the parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - Guest's name.
      icNum - Guest's IC/Passport number.
      Returns:
      j Successfully search, it returns the index of the array list guestList that contains the guest with given name and IC/Passport number from the parameter. If not successful, return -1;

    • updateGuestDetails

      public static int updateGuestDetails(String name_input, String icNum_input)
      This method updates the guest details (attributes from guest class). It does so by searching the index of the particular guest in the array list guestList by matching the name and IC/Passport number of the guest. Then the staff is given the options to choose which attribute to change and the particular guest detail can be updated.
      Parameters:
      name_input - Guest's name.
      icNum_input - Guest's IC/Passport number.
      Returns:
      Unsuccessfully update, returns 0,no such customer is found in database, unable to update details. Successful update, returns 1.

    • printGuestProfile

      public static void printGuestProfile(String name, String icNum)
      This method prints a particular guest details (attributes from guest class). It does so by searching the index of the particular guest in the array list guestList by matching the name and IC/Passport number of the guest. If guest is not found, it will inform the staff and the values of the attribute will not be printed. Else if the guest is found, it will print out all the attributes of that particular guest.
      Parameters:
      name - Guest's name.
      icNum - Guest's IC/Passport number.

    • printGuestProfileAllExisting

      public static void printGuestProfileAllExisting()
      This method prints all existing guest's details (attributes from guest class). Existing guest means that they are currently staying in the hotel. Guest who made the reservation but have not check in are not considered as existing guest because it is possible that they do not show up to check in. To know if guest is existing, we will check the room number of each guest in array list guestList, if its not NA then guest has a room and it means guest is a existing guest.

    • printGuestProfileAll

      public static void printGuestProfileAll()
      This method prints all the guest's details (attributes from guest class). All guest means that it includes existing guest and non existing guest. Existing guest means that they are currently staying in the hotel while non-existing guest are those that have checked out, made a reservation but have not checked in or guest that made a reservation but reservation have expired.

    • saveFile

      public static void saveFile() throws IOException
      This method saves all the values of the attribute of the guest class and saves it into our database. We extract the values from each guest in array list guestList and separate the values by '|', our separator. We then combine all the values of the attribute of the guest into a string and add to a list of string containing the values of the attributes.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be written to or closed.

    • read

      public static List read(String fileName) throws IOException
      This method reads the values of the attributes in our database. Each line in our database corresponds to a different guest and this function is able to read all the lines in our database to extract those values.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The location of our guest database.
      Returns:
      data is the list of strings.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be read or to closed

    • init

      public static void init() throws IOException
      This method initialize all the values of the attribute of the guest class and creates a guest class. We extract the values from the data in our guest database as the value of each attribute is separated by '|'. It then adds those guest created into guestList, our array list of guest.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be read or to closed

    • getGuestList

      public static ArrayList<Guest> getGuestList()
      Gets the array list containing guest classes.
      Returns:
      guestList, array list containing guest.

    • setGuestList

      public static void setGuestList(ArrayList<Guest> gL)
      Sets the guestList, the array list containing guest.
      Parameters:
      gL - array list containing guest class.

    • getGuest

      public static Guest getGuest(String name, String icNum)
      This method returns the guest in array list of guest. Firstly it will search the array list, guestList and find the index containing that particular guest by comparing the name and IC/Passport number given. Returns the guest class if such a guest if found, if not found returns null.
      Parameters:
      name - array list containing guest class.
      icNum - array list containing guest class.
      Returns:
      guest class if guest is found in database, returns null if guest is not found in database.
